name: Employee Update
query:
SELECT
    e.employee_name AS "Employee Name:Data:200",
    e.company_email AS "Company Email:Data:220",
    e.status AS "Status:Data:120",
    e.date_of_joining AS "Date of Joining:Date:120",
    e.final_confirmation_date AS "Final Confirmation Date:Date:160",
    e.designation AS "Designation:Link/Designation:160",
    e.reports_to AS "Reports To:Link/Employee:160",
    e.department AS "Department:Link/Department:160",
    e.employment_type AS "Employment Type:Data:140",
    e.grade AS "Grade:Data:100",
    e.custom_sub_grade AS "Sub Grade:Data:120",

    -- From User (matched by email)
    (
        SELECT u.role_profile_name
        FROM `tabUser` u
        WHERE u.email = e.company_email
        LIMIT 1
    ) AS "Role Profile:Data:160",

    (
        SELECT u.module_profile
        FROM `tabUser` u
        WHERE u.email = e.company_email
        LIMIT 1
    ) AS "Module Profile:Data:160",

    (
        SELECT 
            CASE 
                WHEN u.search_bar = 1 THEN 'Yes'
                ELSE 'No'
            END
        FROM `tabUser` u
        WHERE u.email = e.company_email
        LIMIT 1
    ) AS "Search Bar:Data:100"

FROM `tabEmployee` e
ORDER BY e.employee_name;
